New Records: Anthony Edwards scored 28 of his 37 points in the second half
Key Match Events: Edwards swished a step-back 3-pointer with 1:12 to play
Edwards drained another 3-pointer with 34.4 seconds left for a 106-101 lead
Powell made a pair of free throws to give the Clippers a 101-100 edge with 1:35 left
Pre-Game Insights: The Clippers were on the verge of a big road win, but Anthony Edwards took control late
Post-Match Reflections: The Timberwolves overcame a 19-point first-half deficit to beat the Clippers, 108-106
Edwards finished 14 for 29 from the field in this one, including a back-to-back 3-pointers late in the fourth quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers have lost three of four
Kawhi Leonard scored eight points on 3-for-11 shooting in his second game of the season since returning from a knee injury
